_comments.$schema: Points to the shadcn/ui JSON schema for validation and autocomplete
_comments.style: UI component style preset - 'new-york' is a modern design variant
_comments.rsc: React Server Components - enables server-side component rendering for better performance
_comments.tsx: Use TypeScript (.tsx) files instead of JavaScript (.jsx) when generating components
_comments.tailwind: Tailwind CSS configuration - specifies how to integrate Tailwind with components
_comments.tailwind.config: Path to Tailwind config file (empty uses default)
_comments.tailwind.css: Path to global CSS file for Tailwind directives
_comments.tailwind.baseColor: Base color theme - 'neutral' uses gray colors as foundation
_comments.tailwind.cssVariables: Use CSS variables for theme colors instead of hardcoded values
_comments.tailwind.prefix: Optional prefix for Tailwind utility classes (empty means no prefix)
_comments.aliases: Path aliases for clean imports - @/components maps to components folder
_comments.aliases.components: Alias for component directory - allows 'import from @/components'
_comments.aliases.utils: Alias for utility functions - allows 'import from @/lib/utils'
_comments.aliases.ui: Alias for UI component library - allows 'import from @/components/ui'
_comments.aliases.lib: Alias for lib directory - allows 'import from @/lib'
_comments.aliases.hooks: Alias for custom React hooks - allows 'import from @/hooks'
_comments.iconLibrary: Icon library used - 'lucide' provides SVG icons for components
